channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Way Of The Cross For Kids

channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch continues his study of the historical narratives in Isaiah 37, namely the attack on Judah by the Assyrians and the events leading up to the siege of Jerusalem. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews his Excellency Christian Carlassare MCCJ, bishop of Rumbek, South Sudan regarding the dire need for humanitarian assistance and protection in South Sudan. (30 minutes).

channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the Examen, a teaching of St. Ignatius of Loyola on daily prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Our Father's Plan

channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Speed Skater Bonnie Blair joins host Bob Dolan to talk about her career, which included winning four gold Olympic medals and about her faith and her volunteer work for Catholic Relief Services. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Born at a tiny 2 pounds, there was little hope Linda would survive. But she began to thrive under the foster care of a special couple, and despite many traumas, a Lourdes pilgrimage and Catholicism changed her life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy continue their conversation with founder and CEO of Emmaus Home, Anne Leopold, about services of care and support for community members with intellectual disabilities. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina present some insightful ways of defending the Faith in an increasingly unreasonable age. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the Examen, a teaching of St. Ignatius of Loyola on daily prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn On Location
channel.desc: At the 2025 Young Catholic professionals conference, Fr. Ken Geraci speaks about mastering spiritual ascent through Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati?s example. Joe Hart also speaks. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.title: Saint Teresa Of The Andes
channel.desc: A documentary on the life and mission of Juanita Fern?ndez Solar, who became the first Chilean Saint: St. Teresa of the Andes. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: CH. 6 THE LAMB BREAKS THE SEALS. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Father Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss Father?s book, ?Christ, Science, and Reason: What We Can Know about Jesus, Mary, and Miracles.? They discuss how the appearance of the Blessed Virgin to St. Bernadette at Lourdes and the many miracles now associated with the site. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Stephen J. Binz explores a holy icon of a specific moment in Church history and what it means for our times. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 5 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Where God Weeps

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: In the Garden of Gethsemane, Jesus offers his human will to the Father, allowing God?s divine will to be done in his suffering and death. The first sorrowful mystery likens Jesus? drops of blood to rubies in the moonlight. (30 minutes).

channel.title: John Paul Ii: Be Not Afraid
channel.desc: An animated biography on the early life of St. John Paul II up to his election as Pope. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: Meet the Donut Man, Fr. Joe, and the kids who work in the Massterpiece Donut Shop as they discover the amazing Massterpiece Machine that helps them learn all about the Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Mother Angelica lends her wisdom on a variety of topics, including the Temple of the Holy Spirit. (60 minutes).
